/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, a large concrete overpass looms, a testament to the city's modern infrastructure. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
